snippet: The Federal Trade Commission exonerated Google from accusations that it violated antitrust statutes, and Al Gore used his considerable negotiating skills to smooth the way for the sale of Current TV to Al Jazeera.
abstract: The Federal Trade Commission exonerated Google from accusations that it violated antitrust statutes, and Al Gore used his considerable negotiating skills to smooth the way for the sale of Current TV to Al Jazeera.

headline.main: Breakfast Meeting: Victories for Gore and Google, but Not Barnes & Noble
